description: Try our easy to follow Meat Lovers' Pizza recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Meat Lovers' Pizza Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 230Â°C. Line a baking tray with baking paper or heat a pizza stone.

Spread base with pizza sauce and top with half the cheese. Squeeze filling from sausage case, and scatter small pieces over pizza. Top with pepperoni, bacon and capsicum. Bake for 10 minutes or until meats are cooked through. Add remaining cheese and cook for a further 5 minutes or until cheese melts. Scatter over parsley and serve.
